title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 30 June 2009 - XWiki

gnz joined #xwiki at 11:07  
gnz - (30/06/2009 11:10): hello  
asyd - (30/06/2009 11:10): hello there  
cypromis left #xwiki at 11:10  
gnz - (30/06/2009 11:10): i'd like to know if there's any way to make a space as a plugin ?  
guillaum1 joined #xwiki at 11:11  
gnz - (30/06/2009 11:11): i have a space with classes, objects, templates and i'd like to know if there's a way to make it as a plugin in order to use it with other xwikis  
asyd - (30/06/2009 11:12): well, you can export it as xar  
arunreddy\_\_ left at 11:14 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
gnz - (30/06/2009 11:17): thanks a lot !  
lucien joined #xwiki at 11:26  
anamarias left at 11:34 ()  
arunreddy joined #xwiki at 11:39  
gnz - (30/06/2009 11:58): asyd: there's something weird with the export feature  
asyd - (30/06/2009 11:59): hmm?  
gnz - (30/06/2009 11:59): i can export a space into HTML  
gnz - (30/06/2009 11:59): but not into a XAR file  
asyd - (30/06/2009 11:59): ?!  
asyd - (30/06/2009 11:59): are you sure to use the import/export feature from the admin part?  
gnz - (30/06/2009 11:59): from the admin part ?  
asyd - (30/06/2009 12:00): well, the admin area  
gnz - (30/06/2009 12:00): i tried from the url > export/Space/Page?format=xar&pages=Space.%25  
asyd - (30/06/2009 12:00): no  
gnz - (30/06/2009 12:00): with format=html it works  
asyd - (30/06/2009 12:01): click on administration, import/export..  
gnz - (30/06/2009 12:03): http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/Exports  
venkatesh joined #xwiki at 12:04  
anamarias joined #xwiki at 12:05  
cristinaS left at 12:07 ("What?! Open source isn't good enough for you? Bersirc 2.2 [ http://www.bersirc.org/ - Open Source IRC ]")

sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 14:52  
guillaum1 - (30/06/2009 14:53): sdumitriu: hi  
sdumitriu - (30/06/2009 14:53): Hi guillaum1  
guillaum1 - (30/06/2009 14:58): sdumitriu: got time to have a look at the tex thingie ?  
sdumitriu - (30/06/2009 14:58): I looked a bit  
sdumitriu - (30/06/2009 14:59): But I got busy with other stuff  
guillaum1 - (30/06/2009 14:59): ok  
glerouge - (30/06/2009 15:38): hi sdumitriu  
glerouge - (30/06/2009 15:38): I've got 2 questions  
glerouge - (30/06/2009 15:39): 1) is about the #footnote macro -> when using it in syntax 2.0, it introduces a linebreak, is there a way it could be avoided ?  
glerouge - (30/06/2009 15:39): 2) did you have the time to look at the latex plugin yet ?  
sdumitriu - (30/06/2009 15:42): 1) I have a new {{footnote}} macro for the 2.0 syntax  
sdumitriu - (30/06/2009 15:42): 2) Yes, briefly  
guillaum1 - (30/06/2009 16:03): sdumitriu is under pressure by the guillaumes :-)  
guillaum1 - (30/06/2009 16:05): sdumitriu: if you need explanations or some changes in code/documentation, feel free to ask  
tmortagne left at 16:20 ("Ex-Chat")  
glerouge left at 16:24 ()

alexmaru - (30/06/2009 16:49): hello  
glerouge left at 16:50 ()  
glerouge joined #xwiki at 16:50  
sdumitriu - (30/06/2009 17:02): Hi alexmaru  
tmortagne joined #xwiki at 17:04  
guillaum1 - (30/06/2009 17:06): sdumitriu: in your opinion, how hard is it to port xwiki on top of Google App Engine ?  
sdumitriu - (30/06/2009 17:06): Ludovic already did it  
guillaum1 - (30/06/2009 17:06): wow !  
guillaum1 - (30/06/2009 17:06): impressive  
guillaum1 - (30/06/2009 17:07): sdumitriu: is there a link to this port or is it a private project for now ?   
sdumitriu - (30/06/2009 17:08): Ask Ludovic  
sdumitriu - (30/06/2009 17:09): He's not here  
guillaum1 - (30/06/2009 17:09): ok :-)
